name: BulletHearts
description:
BulletHearts is a game about cephalopods that shoot their own hearts to kill each other. (That may be a bit creepy haha) 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 44 Compo by Alberto "_beta" Mellado.

-----------------------

Written in C# on Unity.

Tools:

Unity

Adobe Photoshop

Audacity

-----------------------

Controls:

Movement -> WASD

Shoot-> Hold left click and release

Mute audio -> SPACE

------------------------

If you do not know what to do:

You can pick the hearts you have already shoot.

Some enemies also shoot their hearts losing HP, you can wait a bit.

------------------------
